category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 8 (Guaranteeing three labor rights)
contents: Article 8 (Guarantee of the three labor rights) ① The Sports Association guarantees employees the freedom to form labor unions and does not impose disadvantages on the grounds of membership in or activities in a labor union. ② The Sports Council guarantees the right to collective bargaining through employee representatives. ③ The Sports Association provides employee representatives with information necessary to carry out labor union activities. [Moved from Article 13, previous Article 8 moved to Article 13 2019. 11. 7.]
